text: I found my passion in powder skiing and moved to Vancouver, BC. My relentless pursuit of knowledge and ski touring in the mountains has led to countless adventures all across the globe.
name: Nelson Silverblade

text: How to solve my issue with my tent's fabric disintegrating was explained promptly and politely. And a free pack of stiching materials was sent to compensate. Excellent service.
name: Goranthil Blackshield

text: “When it comes to backpacking, The Gull is my #1 go-to tool. If you’re serious about backpacking, you need The Gull.
name: Tarathiel Shadowdancer

text: The bicycle travel makes it super easy and is well worth the money. The ease of use of the whole thing. Even though I dislike pedaling, it makes it almost enjoyable.
name: Ingus Snowstorm

text: I had a fantastic experience today buying my first road bike. You guys have a great tone. Thanks again for a great experience
name: Mohan Muruge
